texasholdem

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • texasholdem.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a poker player. This class does not contain the betting logic needed to play the game, but it holds the player's cards, chip amount, and other useful values. It represents both human and computer players.
    Author:
    John Wardell

    • Constructor Summary

        public void setPersonality(int i)
        The personality value influences how the player will bet.
        Parameters:
        i - the 0-9 personality of this player.

      • setChips

        public void setChips(int chips)
        Sets the amount of chips the player will have for the game. This amount must be validated by the caller.
        Parameters:
        chips - this player's chips.

      • getChips

        public int getChips()
        Returns:
        this player's chips amount.

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean b)
        A player is active until they run out of chips.
        Parameters:
        b - true if active, false if not.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Returns:
        true if active, false if not.

      • setPlaying

        public void setPlaying(boolean b)
        A player is playing until they fold or are inactive. Each active player is set to playing for each hand.
        Parameters:
        b - true if playing, false if not.

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Returns:
        true if playing, false if not.

      • setBot

        public void setBot(boolean b)
        A bot is a computer controlled player.
        Parameters:
        b - true if a bot, false if a person.

      • isBot

        public boolean isBot()
        Returns:
        true if a bot, false if a person.

      • setAllIn

        public void setAllIn(boolean b)
        Player is set to all in when they have bet all their chips.
        Parameters:
        b - true if all in, false if not.

      • isAllIn

        public boolean isAllIn()
        Returns:
        true if all in, false if not.

      • setBet

        public void setBet(int bet)
        Player's bet is the total amount bet by this player in this hand. This amount must be validated by the caller.
        Parameters:
        bet - the player's total, current bet.

      • getBet

        public int getBet()
        Returns:
        the player's total, current bet.
